content: around pop single_crochet in the next double_crochet fphdc around the next fptr repeat join with a slip_stitch 12fphdc 36sc 4 this is a free pattern designed by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own round 6 standing fphdc around any fphdc from the previous round single_crochet in the next single_crochet single_crochet in the single_crochet made around pop fptr around the first double_crochet of the v-st from r3 fptr around the second double_crochet of the v-st from r3 single_crochet in the next st fphdc around the next fphdc repeat join with a slip_stitch 12fphdc 36sc 24fptr round 7 standing fpdc around any fphdc from the previous round ch1 v-st 3 ch1 fpdc around the next fphdc repeat join with a slip_stitch 12fpdc 12v-st 3 24ch1sp 5 this is a free pattern designed by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own round 8 standing fpsc around any fpdc from the previous round 5dc ch2 5dc in the next ch3sp fpsc around the next fpdc repeat join with a slip_stitch 12fpsc 12 petals 12ch2sp round 9 pop in any fpsc from the previous round ch4 bphdc around the fifth double_crochet of the petal ch1 bphdc around the next double_crochet ch4 pop in the next fpsc repeat join with a slip_stitch 12pop 24ch4sp 24bphdc round 10 standing fpdc around any pop from the previous round 5dc in the ch4sp ch2 skip the next half_double_crochet ch1sp half_double_crochet 5dc in the next ch4sp fpdc around the next pop repeat join with a slip_stitch 120dc 12fpdc 12ch2sp 6 this is a free pattern designed by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own round 11 standing fptr around the second half_double_crochet from r9 5tr ch2 5tr in the next fpdc fptr around the first half_double_crochet from r9 ch2 fptr around the next half_double_crochet 5tr ch2 5tr in the next fpdc repeat join with a slip_stitch 24fptr 12 petals 12ch2sp round 12 start from the first fptr next to any petal standing fpsc around both fptr from the previous round and double_crochet from r10 the one before ch2sp grab them together fptr in the top of the petal from r8 fpsc around the next fptr from r11 and double_crochet from r10 together bphdc in each of the next 5tr 5sc in the ch2sp bphdc in the next 5tr repeat join with a slip_stitch 24fpsc 12fptr 120bphdc 60sc 7 this is a free pattern
